sourcesContent:
Books

  • {{book.ISBN}} {{book.title}} {{book.author}}
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { BookService } from "../services/book.service"; import { Book } from "./book"; @Component({ selector: 'book-list', templateUrl: './book-list.component.html' }) export class BookListComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private bookService: BookService) {} public books: Book[] = []; // public selectedBook: Book = undefined as any; // public selectedBook: Book | undefined = undefined; public selectedBook?: Book; ngOnInit(): void { this.bookService.getBooks().then(b => this.books = b) } onClick(book: Book) { this.selectedBook = book; } deselectBook(): void { this.selectedBook = undefined; } }
